name: PSP Video File
summary: Learn about .MGV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MGV files can be transferred to a Sony PSP via a MemoryStick memory card or a USB connection.

description: Video file that can be played on the Sony PlayStation Portable (PSP) handheld device; typically used for TV shows and movies; may be downloaded from the P-TV (portable TV) video download service in Japan or from Go!View in the UK and Ireland.
